name: DrunkFist: Early Drinker
description:
GRAB THE BOTTLES & PUNCH SOME COCKROACHES !

Don't let the bottles hit the ground ! Cockroaches will often come to stun you, punch'em before it's too late !

Small Game&Watch type game made in few hours !

Have fun playing this alternative version of DrunkFist !

Controls :

Left/Right Arrows - Move the character / punch the ennemies

Guillaume Lefebvre : Programmer

Pierre Morreel : Game Art

Loïc Mouray : Game Design / Sound

Music poorly made on Beepbox
